mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin (name, user_pwd, user_email, is_out) VALUES (#{name}, #{user_pw}, #{user_email}, 'Y');
mapper.select: SELECT user_pwd, user_email FROM admin WHERE user_email=#{user_email};
SELECT p.id, c.category_name, p.product_name, p.price, p.cost, p.product_state FROM product p inner join category c ON p.category_id = c.category_name ORDER BY c.id ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_name, price, img_url, product_state, cost, category_id) VALUES (#{product_name}, #{price}, #{img_url}, #{product_state}, #{cost}, #{category_id});
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.amount, p.product_name, c.date, c.sale_code FROM cart c inner join product p ON p.id = c.product_id WHERE c.date=#{date};
SELECT c.id, c.amount, p.product_name, c.date, c.sale_code FROM cart c inner join product p ON p.id = c.product_id;
